title: advanced-sdk-ts wrong import
body:
**Describe the bug**

This import:
https://github.com/elizaOS/eliza/blob/81a35281b93d5e8ca0745e9d13a1943e9a90681b/packages/plugin-coinbase/package.json#L24C1-L25C1

Makes it impossible to correctly add @elizaos/agent to any new project because it indirectly depends on @elizaos/plugin-coinbase which depends on this specific local file. 

**To Reproduce**

- Create an empty project
- pnpm add @elizaos/agent
- pnpm install

**Expected behavior**

@elizaos/agent is expected to be imported correctly.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6b249868-faed-48df-8d65-0d33ae9f8149)

comments.author: github-actions
comments.body: Hello @andyvalerio! Welcome to the elizaOS community. Thank you for opening your first issue; we appreciate your contribution. You are now an elizaOS contributor!

comments.author: andyvalerio
comments.body:
Same issue for **plugin-injective**. 

A workaround is to manually copy the code of those packages and place them where _pnpm_ expects them.

title: Text Transcription Error For Discord Plugin
body:
After installing ffmpeg I get the follow error as my agent is trying to transcribe audio from a voice channel

```shell
Starting transcription...
Error processing transcribed text: TypeError: The database connection is not open
    at Database.prepare (C:\Users\wolve\yuna-8\eliza\node_modules\better-sqlite3\lib\methods\wrappers.js:5:21)
    at SqliteDatabaseAdapter.getAccountById (file:///C:/Users/wolve/yuna-8/eliza/packages/adapter-sqlite/dist/index.js:193:33)
    at AgentRuntime.ensureUserExists (file:///C:/Users/wolve/yuna-8/eliza/packages/core/dist/index.js:41431:52)
    at AgentRuntime.ensureConnection (file:///C:/Users/wolve/yuna-8/eliza/packages/core/dist/index.js:41458:18)
    at VoiceManager.handleUserMessage (file:///C:/Users/wolve/yuna-8/eliza/packages/client-discord/dist/index.js:3339:32)   
    at VoiceManager.processTranscription (file:///C:/Users/wolve/yuna-8/eliza/packages/client-discord/dist/index.js:3328:28)
    at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:105:5)
    at async Timeout._onTimeout (file:///C:/Users/wolve/yuna-8/eliza/packages/client-discord/dist/index.js:3260:17)
``` 

"This error occurs in the voice message processing pipeline when trying to access the SQLite database."

Any help or direction would be appreciated. I also have my elevenlabs API key provided in my env file.

comments.author: wolfskyknight

Update.

Now I'm getting the following in my log but no database errors. Agent is currently not talking but attempting to transcribe audio it's hearing in the voice channel it seems.

